name: df-pgp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cpgp, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(cv(s1), cgrp)), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), wrex(s3, cn0, wceq(cfv(cfv(cod, cv(s1)), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s3))))))))
comment: Define the set of p-groups, which are groups such that every element has a power of ` p ` as its order. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 5-Oct-2020.)
